data.text: You wealthy women of Samaria have grown fat like [MET] the fat cows of the Bashan region.
But Yahweh our God has said this:
Your enemies will drag you out through breaks/holes in your city walls,
Go to Bethel and Gilgal towns where many people worship me
Bring offerings of bread to thank me,
I am the one who caused there to be no food in any of your cities and towns [DOU],
When it was still three months before the time of harvesting crops,
People would stagger from one town to another town to find water,
I caused your grain fields to dry up;
I caused you to experience ◄plagues/severe sicknesses►
I got rid of many of you,
So now, you people of Israel, I am going to punish you.
